articles.title: Wallabies injury crisis deepens as star ruled out of Argentina Test due to head knock
articles.description: Wallabies injury crisis deepens as star ruled out of Argentina Test due to head knock
articles.content:
The Wallabies’ nightmare injury curse has struck yet again as hooker Folau Fainga’a became the latest star to enter the casualty ward.
Fainga’a will miss the second Test against Argentina due to concussion and his absence places Lachlan Lonergan into... [1920 chars]

articles.title: Sergio Romero joins new club after interest in Manchester United return
articles.description: Former Man United goalkeeper Sergio Romero has returned to Argentina with Boca Juniors.
articles.content:
Sergio Romero has joined Argentine giants Boca Juniors on a free transfer.

articles.title: FACTBOX-Monkeypox cases and deaths around the world
articles.description:
* SPAIN reported its second death on July 30. Below is a list of non-endemic countries that have reported monkeypox cases: ASIA-PACIFIC * AUSTRALIA had confirmed 66 cases as of Aug. 9.
* The UNITED ARAB EMIRATES had reported 16 infections as of July 24. AMERICAS * ARGENTINA had confirmed 49 cases as of Aug. 11. * The BAHAMAS confirmed its first case on June 24.
articles.content: More than 80 countries where monkeypox is not endemic have reported outbreaks of the viral disease, which the World Health Organization has declared a global health emergency, as confirmed cases crossed 31,400 and non-endemic countries reported their... [4565 chars]

articles.title: First-of-its-kind armored dinosaur discovered - and it’s only as big as a house cat
articles.description: Scientists have discovered the remains of a small armored dinosaur in Argentina.
articles.content:
Similar to an average house cat, it measured about 5 feet (1.5 meters) long and weighed only 9 to 15 lbs (4-7kg).
The dinosaur likely walked upright on its back legs through a steamy landscape about 100 million years ago.

articles.title: Argentina hikes interest rates to 69% as inflation soars
articles.description: Argentina's central bank raised its benchmark interest rate by 950 basis points on Thursday as the country struggles to keep a lid on spiraling inflation that rose to a 20-year high of 71%, according to new data.
articles.content:
Buenos Aires Argentina's central bank raised its benchmark interest rate by 950 basis points on Thursday as the country struggles to keep a lid on spiraling inflation that rose to a 20-year high of 71%, according to new data.

articles.title: Remains Of First-Of-Its-Kind Dinosaur Unearthed In Argentina
articles.description: Paleontologists believe the small upright creature is the first armored dinosaur found that evolved in South America.
articles.content:
Topline
Paleontologists have discovered the partial skeleton of a previously unknown dinosaur in southern Argentina that they say is the first evidence of an armored dinosaur evolving in South America, according to a paper published Thursday.

articles.title: Argentina orders seizure of Venezuelan plane at U.S. request
articles.description: Argentina on Thursday ordered the seizure of a Venezuelan plane held in Buenos Aires since June at the request of the United States, amid suspicions the aircraft of Iranian origin could have ties to terrorism, local media reported.

articles.description: Jakapil kaniukura was about 5ft long and probably walked upright in then-steamy Patagonian landscape about 100m years ago
articles.content:
Palaeontologists have announced the discovery of a previously unknown small armoured dinosaur in southern Argentina, a creature that probably walked upright on its back legs roaming a then-steamy landscape about 100m years ago.

articles.title: Bartering increases in Argentina as inflation keeps soaring
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Argentina reported a monthly inflation rate of 7.4% in July, the highest number in two decades for a country where citizens are used to increasing prices. Over the past year, Argentina’s consumer prices have soared a whopping 71%, the INDEC national statistics agency said Thursday.
articles.content: A vendor sits surrounded by her secondhand garments displayed at a market where people can buy or barter goods, on the outskirts of Buenos Aires, Argentina, Wednesday, Aug. 10, 2022. Argentina has one of the world’s highest inflation rates, currently... [4742 chars]
